feed.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [GRA, RBX, SBG, BHS / France, Canada][ Cisco ASA firewall] – Baremetal – Cisco ASA firewall – Planned Service End of Life
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Aug 31, 10:00 - 11:00 UTC

Dec 6, 12:21 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 28/02/2022 10:00 UTC
Service impact : As part of the product lifecycle management we plan to end the baremetal service of Cisco ASA firewall by August 31, 2022. This service interruption will concern only the customers who have previously subscribed to this service.
OVHcloud will decommission the service so that you won’t be able to connect to your Cisco ASA firewall from that date.
Please make the appropriate backup of your data prior that date.
---------------------------------------------------
Heure de début : 28/02/2022 10:00 UTC
Impact du service : Dans le cadre de la gestion du cycle de vie des produits, nous prévoyons de mettre fin au service baremetal du pare-feu Cisco ASA au 31 aout 2022. Cette interruption de service ne concernera que les clients qui ont précédemment souscrit à ce service.
OVHcloud mettra le service hors service de sorte que vous ne pourrez plus vous connecter à votre pare-feu Cisco ASA à partir de cette date.
Veuillez effectuer les sauvegardes appropriées de vos données avant cette date.

entry.title: [GRA2/RBX8/SBG3/WAW1][Network] - Network equipment operation

Aug 8, 21:47 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 25/08/2022 20:00 UTC
End time : 25/08/2022 23:30 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : In order to maintain continuous improvement of our internal network infrastructure, we will upgrade the version of multiple network equipment.

Aug 11, 18:12 UTC
Scheduled - Start time: 25/08/2022 04:00 UTC
End time: 25/08/2022 07:00 UTC
Service impact: A few seconds of Input/Output freeze when the service will do a switchover (2 times)
Service improvement: As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will do a maintenance operation on our network equipment related to Hosted Private Cloud products to maintain consistency.

entry.title: [RBX/BHS][Backup Storage] - Firewall upgrade
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Aug 23, 06:30 UTC  -  Aug 30, 15:00 UTC

Aug 2, 22:32 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 23/08/2022 06:30 UTC
End time : 30/08/2022 15:00 UTC
Service impact : Slowdowns (a few seconds) may be observed during the deployment on your specific server.
Service improvement : Following the incident that occurred during the maintenance in https://bare-metal-servers.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/c205tcjnl5q4, we've rollback the change and we are now ready to plan a new deployment.
